pre_caption: This is a point-of-view video from a vehicle driving down a city street at night. The street is lined with parked cars and illuminated by streetlights and lights from nearby buildings. The vehicle moves forward, approaching and passing through an intersection with a stop sign painted on the road.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
